Internet radio the way it was meant to be
Internet radio has no limit on its ability to reach listeners.The fact a good portion of Internet radio stations are ran by music loving hobbyists, the music being played is not limited to what is promoted by the music industry which is driven by profits or ratings. RJB Radio is soley supported out of pocket and with 0% monetary gain.We promote the unsigned,Indie and creative commons licensed music along with mainstream music and pay all the required licensing fees through streamlicensing.com.
